control01.title: Data Loggers
control01.description: Automatically receive data from data loggers in the field and sent via email or FTP upload.

control02.title: Excel Upload
control02.description: Support CSV, XLS and XLSX formats for convenient uploads.

control03.title: Environmental Tracking System
control03.description: The ETS is an online environmental monitoring database that allows you to access your data from anywhere at any time.

control05.title: Notifications and Warnings
control05.description: The ETS keeps you informed by email and SMS of uploads, warnings and exceedances.

control06.title: Internet Forms
control06.description: Enter and edit your data online using our easy-to-use and configurable internet forms.

control07.title: Graphs and Reports
control07.description: The ETS has a number of graph and reporting formats that allow you to get the information you need from your data.
